SHORT_DESCR.P: NRK is planning a transformation of its IT delivery model, including all IT services currently delivered by both internal and external resources. NRK is seeking information from the market regarding how such a transformation should be conducted, and how NRK can cooperate with one or more strategic partners.

NRK invites to a technical market dialogue (RFI) with the objective to explore the market and initiate the dialogue with potential strategic partners. Our goal is to convert this RFI into a RFP during 10.2018.

We ask contenders to note that this is the only planned announcement of this procurement. The Contracting authority uses Mercell Sourcing Services. To show your interest, as well as access any documents, click the link below or copy and paste the link into your browser. [[https://my.mercell.com/permalink/81034003.aspx]].

Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation Limited, subsequently named NRK, has recently established 5 sourcing principles, whereas the first principle states that “Everything not part of NRK’s core business should be considered for outsourcing”. In light of this, NRK is currently planning a transformation of its IT delivery model, which can potentially include all IT services currently delivered by both internal and external resources. NRK is planning to conduct the transformation in a stepwise manner, and is in this respect seeking information from the market regarding how such a transformation should be conducted, and how NRK can cooperate with one or more strategic partners.

NRK invites to a technical market dialogue (RFI) with the objective to explore the market and initiate the dialogue with potential strategic partners. The overall objective of the RFI process is to receive information from the market, ensure that the best-suited vendors deliver insightful and knowledgeable responses, and ensure their interest in participating in the future RFP process. The RFI should give NRK knowledge and a solid foundation to decide the scope of the RFP, and NRK aims to achieve this by asking open, challenging and relevant questions.

NRK wants a vendor that can deliver as many of the services in scope as possible, but vendors that specialize in only one or some of the services in scope should nonetheless participate in the process. NRK is also open for vendors cooperating to deliver a larger part of the described scope.

We ask contenders to note that this is the only planned announcement of this procurement. The Contracting Authority uses Mercell Sourcing Services. To show your interest, as well as access any documents, click the link below or copy and paste the link into your browser. NRK is planning a transformation of its IT delivery model, including all IT services currently delivered by both internal and external resources. NRK is seeking information from the market regarding how such a transformation should be conducted, and how NRK can cooperate with one or more strategic partners.

NRK invites to a technical market dialogue (RFI) with the objective to explore the market and initiate the dialogue with potential strategic partners. Our goal is to convert this RFI into a RFP during 10.2018.

We ask contenders to note that this is the only planned announcement of this procurement. The Contracting Authority uses Mercell Sourcing Services. To show your interest, as well as access any documents, click the link below or copy and paste the link into your browser. [[https://my.mercell.com/permalink/81034003.aspx]].
Our goal is to convert this RFI into a sharp competition during 10.2018 by initiating a procurement process.

SUITABILITY.P: Certificate or equivalent documentation showing that the Contender is registered in a public register in their home country.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: The contender shall have sufficient economic and financial capacity to fulfill his contractual obligations. The requirement may be changed during the RFI process.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: — financial statements for the last 3 fiscal years including P&L statement, balance sheet, board of directors’ annual report and external auditor’s report,
— a solvency assessment of the Contenders economic and financial situation not older than 3 months,
— any recent information of relevance, e.g quarterly reports.
The requirement may be changed during the RFI process.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: The contender shall have good experience from previous similar and relevant deliveries.
The contender shall have the capacity to nationwide delivery and support.
The contender shall have established suitable methods and/or systems to ensure the quality of the deliveries.
The contender shall have established suitable methods and/or systems to ensure information security.
The requirement may be changed during the RFI process.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Documentation of the most important relevant deliveries the last 3 years.

Documentation of the organisational, professional and technical qualifications of the contender, whether it belongs to the contender itself or subcontractors/co-operating enterprises, listing the number of personnel that can be made available for the execution of the contract.

A copy of certificates (ISO or equivalent) issued by an accredited certification body that documents that the contender has implemented quality assurance measures relevant to the scope. If the contender is not certified according to relevant standards a brief presentation of the contender’s implemented methods and/or systems for quality assurance for the relevant parts of the deliveries.
A copy of certificates (ISO or equivalent) issued by an accredited certification body that documents that the contender has implemented information security assurance measures relevant to the scope.

If the contender is not certified according to relevant standards a brief presentation of the contender’s implemented methods and/or systems for information security assurance for the relevant parts of the deliveries.
The requirement may be changed during the RFI process.
